level.heading: BUS STOPS, BUS ZONES, AND BUS STANDS (ยง 18-4022)

level.text: Bus stops, bus zones, and bus stands are established at the specific locations listed in this section.
From a point approximately 349 feet west of 13th Street to a point approximately 457 feet west of 13th Street, on the north side, “No Standing or Parking, Metro Bus Zone”;

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: 17 DCRR ยง 40.115, Special Edition (September28, 1970); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 53 DCR 5519 (July 7, 2006).
